message:
Hi guys I’m after good adhesive sealants after iv done some jumpering on board. 

Anyone recommended a good one 

cheers
[url]https://www.google.com/search?q=conformal+spray&client=firefox-b&source=lnms&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwip94-cs-zdAhWqJcAKHU00CSEQ_AUICSgA&biw=1008&bih=484&dpr=1.67[/url]

Cheers for that 

I have 820-00165 no liquid damaged it’s clean board missing pm_slp_S4 on power supply I’m getting 0.031 Am I thinking it’s 
dead cpu. S4 en is missing

Is a long way to diagnose dead CPU; at least with the info posted...

PM_SLP_S4_L doesn't even pulse?
Did you check basic signals from Power On Sequence?

hi checked all these
ppbus_g3h 8.60v ok
ppbus_s5   8.60v ok 
ppbus_hso 8.60v ok 
dcin isol     8.60v ok
dcin g3h    8.60v ok
pp3v42_g  3.42v ok
ppvrtc_g3 3.00v ok 
pp5v_s5   5.00v ok 
pp5vs4     5.00v missing
s4 en missing
Pm_slp_s4 missing
pm_dsw_pwrgd ok

"Pm_slp_s4 missing"
Doesn't even pulse???

Post SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_BATLOW_L, PM_SLP_SUS_L.

pm_slp_s4 plusing yes
smc _adpter_en 3.4v
pm_batlow_l 0.035v
pm_slp_sub_l 3.321v

"pm_slp_s4 plusing yes"
PP5V_S4 should pulse too.
Check all big coils for pulse.
AL_SYS_PWRGD pulses too?

BTW, always better to check for pulses on power rails with o-scope...

PP5V_S4 PULSING YES
AL_SYS_PWRGD PULSING YES
S4 EN PULSING YES 

ALL COILS PLUSING APART FROM L7560 AND L7130
ALL CHECKed WITH O-SCOPE

I HAD SCOPE AT 200mV

"ALL COILS PLUSING"
So L7310/20 pulse too?

"APART FROM L7560 AND L7130"
Is normal, these have steady voltage.
I was reffering to the rest of coils.

The o-scope should catch peak level of a power rail, or signal.

Check if pins 7 & 3 of U1950 pulse too.
U1950 Pin 3 7 are both pulsing

"So L7310/20 pulse too?"

Check SPI termination resistors and traces for U6100.
Don't forget to look at U6101 too.

hi L310/20 pluse too
checked all spi termination resistors all look ok trace u6100 ok 
check u6101 all good

Don't look, measure...

Check for short, or low resistance on the power rails from page 58.
Also check PP1V5_S0.
Hi no short or low resistance but pp1v5_s0 is missing
Post U7870 voltages.

u7870
pin 1 0v
pin 2 un
pin 3 0v
pin 4 3.2v
pin 5 gnd
pin 6 0v

L7820 pulsing?
Any short there?
If not, heck voltages for U7820.
Same 1V8_S3 should go to U7870.

However check pins 1, 3, 6 of U7870 for pulse, not for steady voltage...

u7870
pin 1 0v plusing
pin 2 un
pin 3 0v plusing
pin 4 3.2v
pin 5 gnd
pin 6 0v plusing

l7820 0v plusing diode mode 0.665 both side 

u7820
pin 1 3.2v
pin 2 0v plusing
pin 3 0v plusing
pin 4 3.2v
pin 5 gnd
pin 6 0v plusing
pin 7 gnd
pin 8 0v plusing
Try new BIOS...
You are the man got a new bios powered on straight way no problems
Cheers for all your help and the time
Be sure to have clean ME region...
Will you recommend a  good bios flasher and we’re to get the files from cheers

TL866, or Medusa 2 if you mainly work MacBook boards.
Medusa 2 doesn't require desolder SPI chip and can even clean the ME region directly on the board...

When you need BIOS dumps post on the forum, if Google didn't help you.

Hi that Macbook is dead again at first it was having problems loading iOS then blinking folder now dead 

all the measurements are as before this is with new bios clean ME

any advise please

820-00165 Hi that Macbook is dead again at first it was having problems loading iOS then blinking folder now dead 

all the measurements are as before this is with new bios clean ME

any advise please

Did it even work good on OSX after BIOS reflashed?
Because you told no problem first time.
When appeard loading problems?

"new bios clean ME"
So you flashed it second time?
Where did you get the dump?

Hi yes buy BIOS new with clean ME 
WAS LOADING PROBLEM THEN SHOWING ? Folder
i buy bios from eBay 

no flash no dump

Why people buy f***g dumps from eBay, I never understand.
You pay subscription here, which allows you to get correct dumps, when needed...

Check all traces and resistors around U6100.
Post backup here.

Hi 2Informaticos,
To get correct dumps should we ask each time for the specific one we need or there is a database where to directly download from?

I don't know about any online database.
Is better to ask here, I do not recommend wasting time with vinafix dumps.
Other webs have not confirmed dumps too, I suppose...
